text:
I have used the Apache Server for a long time but now I can't.
The matter is that I installed Windows XP Service Pack 2 and the 
page "localhost" doesn't open now though it did before.
I downloaded and installed Apache v2.0.52 but it doesn't even start - it says 
a usual error "The memory could not be written".
Can you help me to get any functionable workable version of Apache Server?
Thank you.
creator: petrov@dnttm.ru
petrov@dnttm.ru
text:
Oops! Sorry, my fault.
I simply didn't manage to configurate it properly.
Now it works.
